title: My Daily Phrase German - Preview Edition
description: This preview edition of MyDailyPhrase German outlines what listeners can expect from the course. We're delighted to announce that MyDailyPhrase German will begin on 12 February 2007. Our daily shows will start from then and over the next 20 weeks listeners can learn basic German in just a few minutes each day. Find out more on our website: http://www.mydailyphrase.com/german
content:encoded: This preview edition of MyDailyPhrase German outlines what listeners can expect from the course. We're delighted to announce that MyDailyPhrase German will begin on 12 February 2007. itunes:subtitle: Announcing the programming schedule for MDP German
